013package org.apache.juneau.swaps;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018import java.util.regex.*;
019
020import org.apache.juneau.*;
021import org.apache.juneau.swap.*;
022
023/**
024 * Transforms {@link MatchResult MatchResults} to {@code List} objects.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * Entries in the list represent matched groups in a regular expression.
028 *
029 * <ul class='seealso'>
030 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-marshall.jm.Swaps">Swaps</a>
031
032 * </ul>
033 */
034public class MatchResultSwap extends ObjectSwap<MatchResult,List<String>> {
035
036   /**
037    * Converts the specified {@link Enumeration} to a {@link List}.
038    */
039   @Override /* ObjectSwap */
040   public List<String> swap(BeanSession session, MatchResult o) {
041      List<String> l = list(o.groupCount());
042      for (int i = 0; i <= o.groupCount(); i++)
043         l.add(o.group(i));
044      return l;
045   }
046}
